title: Jockey by Design: Women's Skimmies Slipshort

asset.author: Jockey
asset.hookText:
Smooths like a slip. Covers like shorts.

Introducing a whole new kind of women's underwear, the Skimmies Slipshort provides smoothing coverage in a comfortable fit—no constriction here! Pair it underneath skirts, dresses and even pants.

Ready for a whole new kind of underwear? Get started at Jockey.com.
